io.github.arkobat.kolorkarl.common

Interface Collidable

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    Bullet, Entity, LivingEntity, Player, Projectile

    public interface Collidable
    Represents objects that can collide with other objects

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      default boolean collides(@NotNull Collidable collidable)
      Checks if the collidable collides with another collidable.
      @NotNull Hitbox getHitbox()
      Get the Hitbox of the collidable
      @NotNull Location getLocation()
      Gets the current location of this entity.
      boolean hasCollision()
      Checks if there is a collision.
      boolean hasColorCollision()
      If the collidable respect colors of platforms.

    • Method Detail

      • hasCollision

        boolean hasCollision()
        Checks if there is a collision.
        Returns:
        if the collidable have collision.

      • hasColorCollision

        boolean hasColorCollision()
        If the collidable respect colors of platforms. If the Collidable have color collision, it will fall thru platforms of different colors.
        Returns:
        if the collidable have color collision

      • getHitbox

        @NotNull
@NotNull Hitbox getHitbox()
        Get the Hitbox of the collidable
        Returns:
        the hitbox

      • getLocation

        @NotNull
@NotNull Location getLocation()
        Gets the current location of this entity.
        Returns:
        the location of the collidable.

      • collides

        default boolean collides(@NotNull
                         @NotNull Collidable collidable)
        Checks if the collidable collides with another collidable. It is assumed all collidable are squares.
        Parameters:
        collidable - the other collidable.
        Returns:
        weather the two collides.
